entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
